movies.title: French Twist
movies.plot: Laurent is the local estate agent, a job that offers easy opportunties for his womanising. His wife beautiful wife Loli looks after his home and two children unaware of his many affairs. However, their world is turned upside down by the arrival of Marijo, an itinerant lesbian whose minivan breaks down nearby. The neglected Loli is drawn to the sensitive Marijo and when she learns of Laurent's infidelities, invites Marijo to move in with them. The arrangement takes an emotional toll on each of them, exacerbated by the arrival of a figure from Marijo's past. As they struggle with the situation and each other, all of their lives are changed forever.
movies.simplePlot: After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.

biography.bio: This Spanish actress started studying dancing. Her teacher encouraged her to participate in her first film Obsession (1977). After that, she was chosen by the director Narciso Ibáñez Serrador to be one of the co-hostesses of the famous TV contest Un, dos, tres... responda otra vez (1972) becoming very well known all over Spain. Since 1975 she also made several films in France and Italy. In Spain, she had her first success with Girl with the Golden Panties (1980), directed by Vicente Aranda. She has won twice the Best Actress Award at the San Sebastial Film Festival for El Lute: Run for Your Life (1987) and for Personne ne parlera de nous quand nous serons mortes (1995). In 1991 she won the Silver Bear at Berlin Film Festival for her work in Lovers: A True Story (1991).
biography.name: Victoria Abril

biography.bio: Josiane Balasko was born on April 15, 1950 in Paris, France as Josiane Balaskovic. She is an actress and writer, known for French Twist (1995), Les bronzés font du ski (1979) and French Fried Vacation (1978). She has been married to George Aguilar since June 12, 2003. She was previously married to Philippe Berry.
biography.name: Josiane Balasko

biography.bio: Alain Chabat was born on November 24, 1958 in Oran, France. He is an actor and producer, known for Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra (2002), Ice Age: Continental Drift (2012) and The Science of Sleep (2006).
biography.name: Alain Chabat

biography.bio: Ticky Holgado was born on June 24, 1944 in Toulouse, Haute-Garonne, France as Joseph Holgado. He was an actor, known for Amélie (2001), Delicatessen (1991) and A Very Long Engagement (2004). He was married to Edith Holgado. He died on January 22, 2004 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Ticky Holgado

biography.bio: Catherine Hiegel was born on December 10, 1946 in Montreuil, Seine-Saint-Denis, France. She is known for her work on French Twist (1995), Violette (2013) and Méchant garçon (1992).
biography.name: Catherine Hiegel

biography.bio: Catherine Samie was born on February 3, 1933 in Paris, France as Catherine Céline Paule Samie. She is an actress, known for The Divorce (2003), L'immortel (2010) and French Twist (1995).
biography.name: Catherine Samie

biography.bio: Catherine Lachens was born on September 2, 1945 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France. She is an actress, known for French Twist (1995), Swann in Love (1984) and Flic ou voyou (1979).
biography.name: Catherine Lachens

biography.bio: Katrine Boorman was born in 1958 in London, England. She is an actress and producer, known for Excalibur (1981), Camille Claudel (1988) and Marie Antoinette (2006). She is married to Danny Moynihan. They have two children. She was previously married to Tom Conran.
biography.name: Katrine Boorman

biography.bio: Telsche Boorman was born in 1957. She was a writer and actress, known for Celestial Clockwork (1995), French Twist (1995) and Where the Heart Is (1990). She died in 1997.
biography.name: Telsche Boorman

biography.bio: Véronique Barrault is an actress, known for Prête-moi ta main (2006), French Twist (1995) and Elle voit des nains partout... (1995).
biography.name: Véronique Barrault

biography.bio: Sylvie Audcoeur is an actress and writer, known for Mes amis, mes amours, mes emmerdes (2009), Frères à demi (2016) and Alliances rouge sang (2016).
biography.name: Sylvie Audcoeur

biography.bio: Michèle Bernier was born on August 2, 1956 in Paris, France as Michèle Vaudelle. She is an actress and writer, known for Michèle Bernier, l'irrésistible (2017), Roman de gare (2007) and The Tulse Luper Suitcases, Part 1: The Moab Story (2003).
biography.name: Michèle Bernier

biography.bio: Maureen Diot is an actress, known for French Twist (1995), Un été à l'envers (1994) and La pucelle des zincs (1995).
biography.name: Maureen Diot

biography.bio: For the past 30 years Miguel Bose has been a major force in Latin Music, crossing all genres but always maintaining an electronic beat. He grew up with Picasso and Ernest Hemingway, who where family friends. In 2007 to celebrate his 30 year career he made the album "Papito" in collaboration with major musical stars all over the world: Shakira, Laura Pausini, Michael Stip (REM), Gloria Gaynor, Ricky Martin, Paulina Rubio, to name a few.
biography.name: Miguel Bosé

biography.bio: Jean-Luc Violet is an actor, known for French Twist (1995), D'un bord à l'autre (2012) and Combi (2013).
biography.name: Jean-Luc Violet

categories.category: Best Screenplay, Original or Adaptation (Meilleur scénario, original ou adaptation)
Best Supporting Actor (Meilleur acteur dans un second rôle)
